mapper.update: create table ${siteId}_empty_keyword ( categoryId varchar(64), timeId varchar(11), rank int, keyword varchar(64), count int, countDiff int, rankDiffType varchar(3), rankDiff int, primary key (categoryId, timeId, rank) ) ${option}
mapper.select: select categoryId, timeId, rank, keyword, count, countDiff, rankDiffType, rankDiff from ( select row_number() over() as r, categoryId, timeId, rank, keyword, count, countDiff, rankDiffType, rankDiff from ${siteId}_empty_keyword ) a where r = 1
mapper.insert: insert into ${siteId}_empty_keyword (categoryId, timeId, rank, keyword, count, countDiff, rankDiffType, rankDiff) values (#{vo.categoryId}, #{vo.timeId}, #{vo.rank}, #{vo.keyword}, #{vo.count}, #{vo.countDiff}, #{vo.rankDiffType}, #{vo.rankDiff})
